recipe.recipe_name: Scrambled Tofu with Spinach and Tomato
recipe.ingredients: 1 block (14 ounces) firm tofu, drained and crumbled,2 cups fresh spinach,1 medium tomato, diced,1/2 tablespoon olive oil,1/4 teaspoon turmeric,1/2 teaspoon garlic powder,1/2 teaspoon onion powder,Salt and pepper to taste
recipe.directions: Heat a nonstick skillet over medium heat and add the olive oil. Add crumbled tofu and cook for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally.,Sprinkle turmeric, garlic powder, and onion powder over the tofu and continue to cook for another 2 minutes.,Add the fresh spinach and diced tomato to the skillet, and cook until the spinach is wilted, which should take about 2-3 minutes.,Season with salt and pepper according to your taste preferences. Serve hot.
recipe.nutrition: Calories 200 per serving (recipe serves 2),Total fat 12g,Saturated fat 2g,Trans fat 0g,Monounsaturated fat 5g,Cholesterol 0mg,Sodium 200mg,Total carbohydrate 10g,Dietary fiber 3g,Total sugars 3g,Protein 19g
